basic.floral_language:
Magnolia denudate
Floriography: purity, noble and pure, pure and fresh 
Yulan as for its white flowers, is known for his noble character. It is the official city flower of Shanghai. 
Yulan is a deciduous tree. Leaves after flowering first, flowers are gigantic, goblet, thicker and very fragrant. Color is white to pale pink. Usually as a landscape ornamental trees, Yulan trees are planted in garden, park, and street or near the house. 
Yulan is suitable for planting in sunny places, slightly resistant to shade. Flowering is from February to March with ornamental period for 1 to 2 weeks
basic.blooming: Flowering period February-March, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
